title: Try a Little Kindness
lyrics:
People around me, all at war with themselves
They don’t hear the sirens over their words
Throwing opinions, instead of asking for help
But there is no good in shouting when you want to be heard

Try A Little Kindness

It’s all we need

Treat the world around you with

Empathy

When you feel afraid

And don’t know what to say

Just try a little kindness

And we’ll be saved



Try a little kindness

And we’ll be saved



Hey ya hey ya

Hey ya hey ya



The way that we’re talking, with anger and blame

It don’t make peace the object, it only divides



Keep trying to win, like conversation’s a game

But there is no need to fight, we’re all on the same side



You gotta try a little kindness

It’s all we need

Treat the world around you with

Empathy

When you feel afraid

And don’t know what to say

Just try a little kindness

And we’ll be saved



Hey ya hey ya (try a little kindness )

We all feel a pain sometimes

Running in the rain sometimes

It’d be a shame

If we wasted our days, not being kind



Turn to your neighbor

Tell em you care

Call up a friend

Let em know you’re there

There ain't no time to waste

There ain't no time to waste

Try a little

Try a little

Kindness
